item.title: Adding css styles with LGI
item.description: In this tutorial I will not teach CSS, only how to add it with GTK+ using LGI. Let’s start with some Lua Our starting point is a Lua document. You can copy the code below if you want to work on your computer. Save the following code as main.lua in a directory on your computer. local lgi = require("lgi") local Gtk = lgi.require("Gtk", "3.0") local Gdk = lgi.require("Gdk", "3.0") assert = lgi.
